title: When the Zeit has Come 1/24: Corona Virus, Doomsday Clock, Nicki Minaj, Comcast
itunes:title: When the Zeit has Come 1/24: Corona Virus, Doomsday Clock, Nicki Minaj, Comcast
description:
On this edition of When the Zeit has come Jack and Miles discuss Corona Virus spreading, the Doomsday Clock at 100 seconds, Nicki Minaj is coming, and Comcast has a nation wide blackout.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
